titleInfo.title: Charles Darwin : the power of place.

mods.abstract: This book covers the events that finally forced the "Origin of Species" into print. [Darwin] suddenly found himself and his ideas being disucssed -- and often attacked -- in circles far beyond those of his familiar scientific community. Demonized by some, defended by others ... he soon emerged as one of the leading thinkers of the Victorian era, a man whose theories played a major role in shaped the modern world
